<< YES!

I'm sitting here and wondering what everyone is talking about. I hardly ever get junk e-mail and nothing of the sort started when I joined this list in November. It must have more to do with your e-mail service provider.

Karin

messages.subject: Re: Junk email
messages.msgSnippet: ... hardly ever get junk e-mail and nothing of the sort started when I joined this list in November. It must have more to do with your e- mail service
messages.messageBody:
--- In AlwaysLearning@y..., "Karin" <curtkar@c...> wrote:
> I'm sitting here and wondering what everyone is talking about. I
hardly ever get junk e-mail and nothing of the sort started when I
joined this list in November. It must have more to do with your e-
mail service provider.
>
> Karin


I have more than one email address. The one I use to subscribe to
yahoo groups very very rarely gets junk email. My other ones get a
fair amount.

Pat
